## BoxStyleProps interface

Style properties for box content

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface BoxStyleProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [color?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.color.md) |  | [FlowColor](./scribing.flowcolor.md) | _(Optional)_ Color of the box |
|  [inline?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.inline.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Determines whether the box shall be rendered inline |
|  [interaction?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.interaction.md) |  | [Interaction](./scribing.interaction.md) \| null | _(Optional)_ The interaction that shall be invoked when the box is clicked |
|  [source?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.source.md) |  | [Script](./scribing.script.md) \| null | _(Optional)_ The script that act as a data source for the box |
|  [variant?](./scribing.boxstyleprops.variant.md) |  | [BoxVariant](./scribing.boxvariant.md) | _(Optional)_ The style variant of the box. |
